reviews.review_msg: Really knowledgable and respectful. Caters the lectures to that specific class's speed/understanding. Fair grader and very interested in the topics he teaches. Great prof all around. But be ready to write a 10-15 page research paper as well as do a presentation on it 2-3 weeks before it's due! Great sample writing material for job apps though.

Very passionate about his subjects and makes a lot of lame jokes. Lectures seem slow sometimes when he asks questions and waits for a response, but this does not take away from the material. Copy slides and take notes from class discussions and you should do well. Exam was easy if you studied. Start the 15 page term paper as early as possible!!!!!
